original_text: the sons of God saw that the daughters of humans were beautiful, and they married any of them they chose.
korean_text: 하나님의 아들들이 사람의 딸들의 아름다움을 보고 자기들이 좋아하는 모든 여자를 아내로 삼는지라

sentences.original_text: that the daughters of humans were beautiful
and they married any of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들 중 아무나와 결혼했다
